name: Doodle & Destroy
description:
Doodle & Destroy is a local multiplayer Strategy x Bullet Hell mash-up where two players construct their generators, fortify them with defense towers and then later try to destroy their enemy's buildings while avoiding tons of bullets.

Controls

Gamepads for both players recommended, but not mandatory.

GAMEPAD (both players): Left Stick - movement, A - building placement / fire, RB or X - focus mode

KEYBOARD (player 1 / player 2): WSAD / Arrows - movement, F / K - building placement / fire, G / L - focus mode

Credits: Luke Spierewka, Paweł Laskowski, Maciej Wierzejski, Kamila Rusiecka

Created in 3 days for Ludum Dare 41.
